text: is a Japanese comedian, actor, voice actor, television presenter, film director and film critic. He is nicknamed . He performs tsukkomi and make stories in the comedy duo Kyaeen. His partner is Udo Suzuki. Amano is represented with Asai Kikaku. He graduated from Okazaki City South Junior High School, Aichi University of Education University High School and Nihon University College of International Relations International Cultural Department (now International Liberal Arts Department). ==Filmography== ===Variety and information programmes=== ====Current==== {|class="wikitable" |- !
